nodes.text: A CT-900 freighter was a model of freighter. One known CT-900 freighter was the StarScavenger, the starship and transport of the Freemakers, a family of scavengers who lived during the Galactic Civil War. The Mon Calamari starship builder Quarrie regarded the CT-900 as an antique ship that had not been seen since the Clone Wars. Zander Freemaker managed to keep the StarScavenger operational by modifying the ship with spare parts.
